snippet: Former South Africa batsman Alviro Petersen has been banned from cricket for two years after admitting sitting in on meetings where plans were hatched to fix matches in the domestic Twenty20 competition....
lead_paragraph: Former South Africa batsman Alviro Petersen has been banned from cricket for two years after admitting sitting in on meetings where plans were hatched to fix matches in the domestic Twenty20 competition.

headline.main: Former South Africa Batsman Petersen Banned for Two Years
headline.print_headline: Former South Africa Batsman Petersen Banned for Two Years
